Milwaukee.WRIT-FM: WRIT-FM (95.7 FM) is a radio station in Milwaukee, Wisconsin, owned by iHeartMedia, and branded as "BIG FM". The station carries a mix of traditional oldies featuring music from the 1960s-1970s, along with many tracks from the 1980s. Its studios are located in the Milwaukee suburb of Greenfield and the transmitter site is located along Capitol Drive on Milwaukee's North Side.
